extendedInfo.description: Kids Halloween App of the Year! Find the differences in 12 great Halloween scenes! With 3 levels of difficulties for each scene, there is a challenge for everyone! A fun and addictive Halloween app for the whole family! In two levels, the clock is ticking - find all differences and avoid mistakes: each mistake will cost you time against the clock. Features - Beautiful high quality Halloween images - Addictive gameplay - Catchy sound effects and music! - Differences randomized on each play - 3 different difficulty levels (timer countdown in 2 of them) The first 2 scenes are free, the remaining 10 can be easily purchased via a single in-app purchase. A fun "Trick or Treat" game for the whole family. Happy Halloween! We really appreciate your feedback - If you enjoy playing our app, please take a minute to rate and review it. Please consider that we cannot reply to your comments in the Appstore. If you have any questions or need our help, please use the given support link. Thank you!
